```{r}


for(i in 1:3156){
  heartmort$PCTPOPOVER65[i] = 100 - heartmort$PCTPOPUNDER30[i] - heartmort$PCTPOP30TO65[i]
  
}
naivelm = lm(HDMORTPERPERSON ~ ., data = heartmort)
summary(naivelm)
```

